ai-patthana16.28:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.28:0.3_0: Only bodily strength, etc., are these causes, and conditions for the sake of a hundred years.
ai-patthana16.28:1.1_0: Or for the sake of grasping there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.28:1.1_1: Or for the sake of grasping there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.28:1.1_2: Or for the sake of grasping, without graspinging those things don’t give rise to the cause, for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana16.28:1.1_3: Or alternatively, conditions don’t give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of grasping. And they don’t arise because of not grasping.
ai-patthana16.28:1.1_4: Or alternatively, conditions don’t give rise to the cause of grasping. ...
ai-patthana16.28:2.1_0: causes and reasons to give rise to these three things. ...
ai-patthana16.28:3.1_0: (They are) not given to the Dhamma for the sake of not grasping. ...
ai-patthana16.28:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.28:4.1_0: the eighth objects have been created by you. ...
ai-patthana16.28:4.1_2: There are ten kinds of results:
ai-patthana16.28:5.1_0: So you don’t give rise to the teaching for the sake of grasping. ...
ai-patthana16.28:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
